title: Cant gift icon?
body: Wanted to gift my friend the Zephyr icon but for some reason gifting an icon isnt an option. :( .. someone help?

replies.body: As Zombiemaster mentioned, gifting icons is currently unavailable.  Updates on this will be available through our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  Let me know if you have any questions!

Unfortunately, icon gifting is currently disabled until Worlds is over. 

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na
